```{r}
A = cbind(c(-1,1),c(-4,-1))
eigen(A)
Arg(eigen(A)$values)/(2 * pi)*360
```

```{r,fig.height=4, fig.width=6}
# plot
N = 21
start = c(1,0)
X = matrix(0,nrow=2,ncol=N)
X[,1] = start
for (i in 2:N) {X[,i] = A %*% X[,i-1]}

plot(X[1,],X[2,],col='blue',xlim=c(-10000,10000),ylim=c(-10000,10000),xlab='x',ylab='y',pch=20,cex=1,type="l")
points(start[1],start[2],col="red")
grid(nx=10,ny=10)
```
